db:select.doc:name: Select Accounts with Owners
db:select.db:sql: SELECT a.id, a.account_number, a.account_type, a.account_name, a.currency, a.balance, a.available_balance, a.status, a.opened_date, a.closed_date, a.interest_rate, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM accounts a WHERE (:customerId IS NULL OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM account_owners ao2 WHERE ao2.account_id = a.id AND ao2.customer_id::text = :customerId )) AND (:accountNumber IS NULL OR a.account_number = :accountNumber) AND (:accountType IS NULL OR a.account_type = :accountType) AND (:status IS NULL OR a.status = :status) ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT (:limit)::integer OFFSET (:offset)::integer

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ((account) -> { id: account.id, accountNumber: account.account_number, accountType: account.account_type, accountName: account.account_name, currency: account.currency, balance: account.balance, availableBalance: account.available_balance, status: account.status, openedDate: account.opened_date, closedDate: account.closed_date, interestRate: account.interest_rate, owners: [], createdAt: account.created_at, updatedAt: account.updated_at })

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- { account_number: payload.accountNumber, account_type: payload.accountType, account_name: payload.accountName default null, currency: payload.currency default "USD", balance: payload.balance default 0.00, available_balance: payload.availableBalance default payload.balance default 0.00, status: payload.status default 'Active', opened_date: payload.openedDate default null, closed_date: payload.closedDate default null, interest_rate: payload.interestRate default null }

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Account
db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO accounts ( account_number, account_type, account_name, currency, balance, available_balance, status, opened_date, closed_date, interest_rate, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( :account_number, :account_type, :account_name, :currency, :balance, :available_balance, :status, :opened_date, :closed_date, :interest_rate, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) RETURNING id, account_number, account_type, account_name, currency, balance, available_balance, status, opened_date, closed_date, interest_rate, created_at, updated_at
INSERT INTO account_owners (account_id, customer_id, relationship_type) VALUES (:accountId, :customerId::uuid, :relationshipType) ON CONFLICT (account_id, customer_id) DO NOTHING

db:select.doc:name: Select Transactions
db:select.db:sql: SELECT id, transaction_number, account_id, transaction_type, amount, currency, transaction_date, value_date, description, merchant_name, category, check_number, reference_number, related_account_id, status, dispute_status, dispute_reason, created_at, updated_at FROM transactions WHERE account_id = :accountId AND (:startDate IS NULL OR transaction_date::date >= :startDate::date) AND (:endDate IS NULL OR transaction_date::date <= :endDate::date) AND (:transactionType IS NULL OR transaction_type = :transactionType) AND (:status IS NULL OR status = :status) ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT (:limit)::integer OFFSET (:offset)::integer
